About

Heya! I’m Teo, or as I go by online, Neo (very distinct names I know). I’m a 4th year computer science student at Heriot-Watt University and I love music, art, and coding!

I love coding in various programming languages, and I have a particular interested in computer graphics and lower-level stuff. Right now I’m working on and off of several personal projects, if you’d like to check them out, check out my GitHub or check out my blog.
